title: Class abstractions
content: A few additional theorems on class abstractions and restricted class abstractions.

blocks.name: bj-unrab
blocks.content: Generalization of ~ unrab . Equality need not hold. (Contributed by BJ, 21-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-unrab(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wss(cun(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), wo(w0, w1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  unssi(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), wo(w0, w1)))
  sstri(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), wo(w0, w1)), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0))
  ax-mp(wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0)), wss(c0, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  rabss2(s0, c0, cun(c0, c1), w0)
  ss2rabi(s0, cun(c0, c1), w0, wo(w0, w1))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wo(w0, w1)))
  orc(w0, w1)
  sstri(crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), wo(w0, w1)), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), w1))
  ax-mp(wss(crab(s0, c1, w1), crab(s0, cun(c0, c1), w1)), wss(c1, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  rabss2(s0, c1, cun(c0, c1), w1)
  ss2rabi(s0, cun(c0, c1), w1, wo(w0, w1))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, c1)), wi(w1, wo(w0, w1)))
  olc(w1, w0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: bj-inrab
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inrab(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, cin(c0, c1), wa(w0, w1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w1)), crab(s0, cin(c0, c1), wa(w0, w1)), cab(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(w0, w1))))
  abbii(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(w0, w1)))
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(w0, w1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(w0, w1)))
  an4(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  elin(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  eqtri(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))), cin(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))))
  ineq12i(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w1), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)))
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s0, c1, w1)
  inab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  df-rab(s0, cin(c0, c1), wa(w0, w1))
}

blocks.name: bj-inrab2
blocks.content: Shorter proof of ~ inrab . (Contributed by BJ, 21-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-inrab3
blocks.content: Generalization of ~ dfrab3ss , which it may shorten. (Contributed by BJ, 21-Apr-2019.) (Revised by OpenAI, 7-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-inrab3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cin(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cin(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0)), cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), c1), cin(c0, cin(c1, cab(s0, w0))))
  ineq2i(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0), cin(c1, cab(s0, w0)))
  dfrab3(s0, c1, w0)
  3eqtr4i(cin(crab(s0, c0, w0), c1), cin(c0, cin(c1, cab(s0, w0))), cin(c1, crab(s0, c0, w0)), cin(c1, cin(c0, cab(s0, w0))))
  ineq2i(c1, crab(s0, c0, w0), cin(c0, cab(s0, w0)))
  dfrab3(s0, c0, w0)
  incom(crab(s0, c0, w0), c1)
  in12(c0, c1, cab(s0, w0))
}

blocks.name: bj-rabtr
blocks.content: Restricted class abstraction with true formula. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-rabtrALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ bj-rabtr . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-rabtrAUTO
blocks.content: Proof of ~ bj-rabtr found automatically by "MM-PA> IMPROVE ALL / DEPTH 3 / 3" followed by "MM-PA> MINIMIZE_WITH *". (Contributed by BJ, 22-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
